content.text: The digital library serves as the Leopoldina's publication server. It provides the Academy and its cooperation partners with the organizational and technical framework for the electronic publication of scientific works. The publication server includes open access publications, electronic theses, and other documentary publications.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The electronic documents published on the publication server are subject to applicable copyright law. All exploitation rights remain with the authors, unless expressly stated otherwise. Users may only use the documents within the scope of the statutory provisions. The publication server is operated by the University of Applied Sciences and Arts in Berlin.

submissionPolicy.text: The collection mandate of the publication server includes the storage, cataloging and provision of all electronic documents published by the Leopoldina or jointly with its cooperation partners. The copyrights of the authors remain fully preserved. Compliance with the copyrights and exploitation rights of third parties is the responsibility of the submitter.
